div.div:
# ADR-001: [Title]
## Status
Accepted | Proposed | Deprecated
## Context
What is the issue? Requirements?
## Decision
What is the change being made?
## Consequences
### Positive
- Benefits...
### Negative
- Drawbacks...
## Alternatives Considered
What else was evaluated?
